EmailTemplate.description: This email is triggered when award is activated to sub.
EmailTemplate.name: AwardActivated
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: {!Award__c.Name} is activated.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello User, This email is to notify you that, the Award # {!Award__c.AwardNumber__c}, {!Award__c.Name} related to Application {!Award__c.ApplicationTitle__c} has been approved by the Utah grants officials and is activated for use.
Kindly login to the UtahGrants Systems and start reviewing the Award details.
Sincerely,
UtahGrants Support Team
